OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELDS GREEN BOND - FUNDING FOR GROUPS

Desc.entry: Provides funding for local community or voluntary groups or organisations working to benefit Sheffield's environment which have a project in the pipeline or an established project that requires extra funding. Groups can register their interest in applying for an award of up to Â£5,000. Seeks to fund projects under three themes: green spaces, waterways and young people. See website for how to apply for a green bond award and for the deadline for completed applications.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: No personal callers, please contact in writing or by telephone
